about_the_game:
An interactive 3D visual novel.

Welcome to Nightlight Secrets, an anime styled interactive 3D visual novel game where you play as Akai Hoshi.

After losing your parents, your brother, Fukoshi Hoshi, and you, Akai Hoshi, has been doing your best to live by yourself. Fukoshi has missed one school year, and one year he felt like returning to it. You both decided that it would be better for him to attend the same school as you, Cherry High.

A mysterious and deep story with multiple endings.

Over the story, you will face some dramas, twists, and unexpected events, and it is your goal to make the best choices to get to the happy ending.

Every choice you make is going to impact the game's story. Various endings are available. Will you be able to get them all?

  • Story Mode

    Discover an interesting mysterious and deep story that contains choices leading you to different endings.

  • Free Missions Mode

    Replay all the missions from the story mode at any time, and try to get the top of the leaderboard with the higher score possible.

  • Explore Mode

    Travel through the various location you visited at least once in the story mode.

  • Characters viewer

    Check out even more details about the characters you met at least once in the story mode.

  • Music Player

    Jam and remix all of the game's soundtrack composed by Raphael Neko!

  • Achievements

    The game is full of achievements that you have to unlock! Will you be able to get them all?
detailed_description:
Feature List

Here are all the features you can expect in the final game:

A unique experience for each player:

  • Every choice you make is going to impact the game's story

  • Every student in the school is randomly generated (Except for the main characters that are important in the story mode)

  • Full customization of Akai's face and haircut

An immersive quality:

  • Animations and voice acting for all the characters

  • All the acts are finished and added to the game

  • A smooth and flawless experience based on players' feedback

A complete support for everyone:

  • Fully compatible with various controller

  • Numerous settings

  • Translations for the final game

  • Steam Cloud Save

  • Steam Achievements

* It is possible that the list variate over the time.
